name: Clivens Petit
bio:
Clivens has more than 10 years of experience as a Java Software Developer with a strong focus on APIs and microservices with the Spring Framework. In addition to his back-end skills, he has been involved in many enterprise-class mobile developments with Android spanning different industries such as e-commerce, politics, and social networking.

Currently, Clivens is the CEO & Co-Founder of Softrizon LLC, a nearshore software development company founded to help small and medium-sized businesses access technology solutions of the same capabilities that large organizations enjoy.
